summary: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.
cast: Ajay Devgn|Shriya Saran|Tabu|Rajat Kapoor|Ishita Dutta|Mrunal Jadhav|Prasanna Ketkar|Yogesh Sonam|Prathamesh Parab|Rishab Chadha|Ashish Warang|Anil Nagarkar|Tarun Shukla|Smita Inamdar|Sanjay Bhatia|Mahesh Rale|Ajit Satbhai|Amruta Satbhai|Sharad Bhutadiya|Pradeep Sharma|Jalender Ghagre|Shiva Naik|Vikas Kumar|Anil Rasal|Rakesh Yadav|Sonika Chopra|Haji Karim|Samar Parshuram|Rajesh More|Abhay Khadapkar|Sachin Pathak|Tanik Singh|Kishor Jayakar|Ratnesh Mani|Sarita Singh|Nishta|Manoj Mishra|Tagore Babu|Regidi Venkataramana Naidu|Jayram Behera|Nandkishor|Machhindra Bhaskar|Sailesh|Cyril Colaco|Dilip Angre|Sachin Gujjar|Vipin Kumar Singh|Divya Sresht|Rajkumar Yadav|Satish Trivedi|Manik Rao|Vignesh Shetty|Manoj Mishra|Vibhuti Chamria|Pritesh Shanbhag|Kirti Kolwankar|Divya Babbar|Ashok Beniwal|Arun Sakpal|Satish Deshmukh|Pradeep Dalvi|Anil Rabade|Sandeep Pandey|Lakhan Kachole|Sunil Pawar|Yogesh Joshi|Pankaj|Karim Hajee|Himanshu Joshi|Behnam Khedri|Mehrad|Mohammad Reza Moghaddam|Kamlesh Sawant|Yogesh Soman|Kasra Zahedi
title: Drishyam
